name: Light The Path
description:
Made for ArtCenter Gamejam 2022 with the theme Through The Darkness

Light The Path is a small puzzle game with an heavy emphasis on light and sound! In this dark game, you must illuminate your way with light and reflectors. Might the light protect you.

Made by : 

Integration & Programmation : 

Benjamin Brunet

Antoine Flynn

3D : 

Loic Bouchard

Tristan Saint-Laurent Blais

Composer : 

Richard Kabushenga
